text: oh inu anthu otsatira Buku! Tsopano mtumwi wathu wadza kwa inu kudzaulula poyera chifuniro chathu patapita nthawi yaitali imene kudalibe Atumwi, kuti mwina mungadzanene kuti: “Sikudabwere kwa ife wodzatiuza nkhani zabwino kapena kudzatichenjeza.” Ndipo Mulungu ali ndi mphamvu pa chinthu china chilichonse
